trans-unit.source: Represents the change to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> for dynamic updates.
trans-unit.target: 表示若要變更<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>進行動態更新。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> objects have been changed during a dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可以用追蹤服務，來判斷哪些<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>動態更新期間已變更的物件。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object will be generated for every RuleCondition that existed before the dynamic update and remains afterwards, and has a different expression.
trans-unit.target: 將的每個動態更新之前就已存在之後繼續留下，以及不同運算式的 RuleCondition 產生這個物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedConditionAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedConditionAction"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedConditionAction"></xref> class, with the existing and new conditions of the change.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedConditionAction"></xref>類別，以變更現有和新條件。

trans-unit.source: The condition being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 要取代的條件。

trans-unit.source: The replacing condition.
trans-unit.target: 取代的條件。

trans-unit.source: newConditionDefinition is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: newConditionDefinition為 null 參考 ()。

trans-unit.source: The name of the conditionDefinition is not equal to the name of newConditionDefinition.
trans-unit.target: 名稱 conditionDefinition 不等於的名稱newConditionDefinition.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition being replaced by this action.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此動作所要取代的條件。

trans-unit.source: This property is settable so that the class can be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是可設定，使類別可以還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: You should not have to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 您應該不需要設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing it during a dynamic update might lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 動態更新期間變更它可能會導致非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: The condition being replaced by this action.
trans-unit.target: 此動作所要取代的條件。

trans-unit.source: Trying to set this property to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the condition be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 取得要取代的條件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 要被取代的條件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition which will replace the existing condition.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定將會取代現有條件的條件。

trans-unit.source: This property is settable so that the class can be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是可設定，使類別可以還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: You should not have to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 您應該不需要設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing it during a dynamic update might lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 動態更新期間變更它可能會導致非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: The condition which will replace the existing condition.
trans-unit.target: 將會取代現有的條件之條件。

trans-unit.source: Trying to set this property to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。
